post:
Hello LET members!

Limited stock, while it lasts. After cancellation we'll remove the server so it won't come back. Price is lifetime or until you cancel the server. We have around 10 available with similar configs. If you want a specific config open a ticket BEFORE you order to check if it is still available.

Our servers are located in our own data centers in Stockholm and are fully owned by us.

We can announce your own ipv4 and ipv6 subnets for free
No custom config/upgrades/changes possible.

Setup time
Within 24 hours
